與世無爭.definition: (idiom) to stand aloof from worldly affairs

與世長辭.definition: to die; to depart from the world forever

與世隔絕.definition: to be cut off from the rest of the world (idiom)

與人方便，自己方便.pinyin: yu3 ren2 fang1 bian4 , zi4 ji3 fang1 bian4
與人方便，自己方便.definition: Help others, and others may help you (idiom).

與人為善.definition: to be of service to others; to help others; benevolent

與全世界為敵.pinyin: yu3 quan2 shi4 jie4 wei2 di2

與其.definition: rather than... (used in expressions of the form 與其|与其[yu3qi2] + {verb1} + 不如[bu4ru2] + {verb2} "rather than {verb1}, better to {verb2}")

與否.definition: whether or not (at the end of a phrase)

與日俱增.definition: to increase steadily; to grow with each passing day

與日俱進.definition: every day sees new developments (idiom); to make constant progress

與日同輝.definition: to become more glorious with each passing day (idiom)

與時俱進.definition: abreast of modern developments; to keep up with the times; progressive; timely

與時消息.definition: variable with the times; transient; impermanent

與狐謀皮.definition: (idiom) to ask sb to act contrary to their own interests (original form of the expression 與虎謀皮|与虎谋皮[yu3hu3-mou2pi2])

與眾不同.definition: to stand out from the masses (idiom)

與虎謀皮.definition: lit. to negotiate with a tiger for its pelt (idiom); fig. to ask sb to act contrary to their own interests
